panels.description: Total number of charging sessions recorded.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  COUNT(DISTINCT charging_sessions.id) AS "Number of Charges"
FROM charging_sessions
LEFT JOIN charging_tag ON charging_sessions.id = charging_tag.charging_sessions_id
WHERE
  ($__timeFilter("started") OR $__timeFilter("ended")) AND
  charging_sessions.vehicle_vin = '$VIN' ${tag_sql:raw}

panels.title: Total Charges

panels.description: Total number of battery cycles. A charge cycle happens when you use all of the battery’s power—but that doesn’t necessarily mean in a single charge.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  SUM(charging_sessions."endSOC_pct" - charging_sessions."startSOC_pct")/100 AS "Number of Charges"
FROM charging_sessions
LEFT JOIN charging_tag ON charging_sessions.id = charging_tag.charging_sessions_id
WHERE
  ($__timeFilter("started") OR $__timeFilter("ended")) AND
  charging_sessions.vehicle_vin = '$VIN' ${tag_sql:raw}

panels.title: Total Cycles

panels.description:
Charging locations: Size and color corresponds to energy charged at that station.
Locations are only recorded when provided from the car.
Energy is taken from exact value that was added to the charging sessions or estimated based on SoC if no exact data is available.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  "final_latitude" AS "Latitude",
  "final_longitude" AS "Longitude",
  "Charger",
  SUM("Amount") AS "Amount"
FROM
  (SELECT DISTINCT
  charging_sessions.id,
  COALESCE(chargers.latitude, ROUND(charging_sessions."position_latitude"::NUMERIC,3)) AS "final_latitude",
  COALESCE(chargers.longitude, ROUND(charging_sessions."position_longitude"::NUMERIC,3)) AS "final_longitude",
  COALESCE(chargers.name, 'unkown') AS "Charger",
  COALESCE("realCharged_kWh",
  ("endSOC_pct" - "startSOC_pct") * (
    CASE WHEN vehicles."carType" = 'ELECTRIC' THEN vehicle_settings."primary_capacity"::NUMERIC
         ELSE vehicle_settings."secondary_capacity"::NUMERIC
    END
    / 100::NUMERIC)) AS "Amount"
FROM charging_sessions
LEFT JOIN locations ON charging_sessions.location_id = locations.osm_id
LEFT JOIN vehicles ON charging_sessions.vehicle_vin = vehicles.vin
LEFT JOIN vehicle_settings ON charging_sessions.vehicle_vin = vehicle_settings.vehicle_vin
LEFT JOIN chargers ON charging_sessions."charger_id" = chargers.id
LEFT JOIN charging_tag ON charging_sessions.id = charging_tag.charging_sessions_id
WHERE
  COALESCE(chargers.latitude, charging_sessions."position_latitude") IS NOT NULL AND
  COALESCE(chargers.longitude, charging_sessions."position_longitude") IS NOT NULL AND
  ($__timeFilter(started) OR $__timeFilter(connected) OR $__timeFilter(locked)) AND
  charging_sessions.vehicle_vin = '$VIN' ${tag_sql:raw}) AS result
GROUP BY "final_latitude", "final_longitude", "Charger"

panels.title: Charge map

panels.description:
Total energy charged.
Energy is taken from exact value that was added to the charging sessions or estimated based on SoC if no exact data is available.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  SUM("Amount") AS "Amount"
FROM
  (SELECT DISTINCT
       charging_sessions.id,
       COALESCE("realCharged_kWh",
      ("endSOC_pct" - "startSOC_pct") * (
        CASE WHEN vehicles."carType" = 'ELECTRIC' THEN vehicle_settings."primary_capacity"::NUMERIC
             ELSE vehicle_settings."secondary_capacity"::NUMERIC
        END
        / 100::NUMERIC)) AS "Amount"
    FROM charging_sessions
    LEFT JOIN vehicles ON charging_sessions.vehicle_vin = vehicles.vin
    LEFT JOIN vehicle_settings ON charging_sessions.vehicle_vin = vehicle_settings.vehicle_vin
    LEFT JOIN charging_tag ON charging_sessions.id = charging_tag.charging_sessions_id
    WHERE
      ($__timeFilter("started") OR $__timeFilter("ended")) AND
      charging_sessions.vehicle_vin = '$VIN' ${tag_sql:raw}) AS result

panels.title: Total Amount

panels.description:
Sum of all charging costs.
Charging costs can be added in each charging session.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  SUM("realCost_ct"::NUMERIC/100::NUMERIC) AS "Cost"
FROM
  (SELECT DISTINCT
       charging_sessions.id,
       "realCost_ct"
    FROM charging_sessions
    LEFT JOIN vehicles ON charging_sessions.vehicle_vin = vehicles.vin
    LEFT JOIN vehicle_settings ON charging_sessions.vehicle_vin = vehicle_settings.vehicle_vin
    LEFT JOIN charging_tag ON charging_sessions.id = charging_tag.charging_sessions_id
    WHERE
      ($__timeFilter("started") OR $__timeFilter("ended")) AND
      charging_sessions.vehicle_vin = '$VIN' ${tag_sql:raw}) AS result

panels.title: Total Cost

panels.description:
Difference between estimated energy charged from the car and real energy charged.
Value is calculated if charging sessions have real energy charged added.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  (SUM("Estimated") - SUM("realCharged_kWh")) / SUM("realCharged_kWh") * 100 AS "Delta %"
FROM
  (SELECT DISTINCT
       charging_sessions.id AS id,
       (("endSOC_pct" - "startSOC_pct") * (
    CASE WHEN vehicles."carType" = 'ELECTRIC' THEN vehicle_settings."primary_capacity"::NUMERIC
         ELSE vehicle_settings."secondary_capacity"::NUMERIC
    END
    / 100::NUMERIC))::NUMERIC AS "Estimated",
    "realCharged_kWh"::NUMERIC
    FROM charging_sessions
    LEFT JOIN vehicles ON charging_sessions.vehicle_vin = vehicles.vin
    LEFT JOIN vehicle_settings ON charging_sessions.vehicle_vin = vehicle_settings.vehicle_vin
    LEFT JOIN charging_tag ON charging_sessions.id = charging_tag.charging_sessions_id
    WHERE
      ($__timeFilter("started") OR $__timeFilter("ended")) AND
      "realCharged_kWh" IS NOT NULL AND "endSOC_pct" IS NOT NULL AND "startSOC_pct" IS NOT NULL AND
      charging_sessions.vehicle_vin = '$VIN' ${tag_sql:raw}) AS result

panels.title: Difference estimated/real

panels.description:
Energy added by AC/DC charging sessions.
AC/DC can be automatically detected if provided from the car. If not it is guessed based on charge power. If the charge power is not available AC/DC can be manually set in the charging sessions.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  "Type",
  SUM("Amount") AS "Amount"
FROM
  (SELECT DISTINCT
     charging_sessions.id, 
     COALESCE(acdc::TEXT, 'unknown') AS "Type",
     COALESCE("realCharged_kWh",
    ("endSOC_pct" - "startSOC_pct") * (
      CASE WHEN vehicles."carType" = 'ELECTRIC' THEN vehicle_settings."primary_capacity"::NUMERIC
           ELSE vehicle_settings."secondary_capacity"::NUMERIC
      END
      / 100::NUMERIC)) AS "Amount"
  FROM charging_sessions
  LEFT JOIN vehicles ON charging_sessions.vehicle_vin = vehicles.vin
  LEFT JOIN vehicle_settings ON charging_sessions.vehicle_vin = vehicle_settings.vehicle_vin
  LEFT JOIN charging_tag ON charging_sessions.id = charging_tag.charging_sessions_id
  WHERE
    ($__timeFilter("started") OR $__timeFilter("ended")) AND
    charging_sessions.vehicle_vin = '$VIN' ${tag_sql:raw} AND
    ("realCharged_kWh" IS NOT NULL OR "endSOC_pct" != "startSOC_pct")) AS result
GROUP BY "Type"

panels.title: AC/DC

panels.description:
Amount of  Energy loaded above and below 0.8C.
1C corresponds to the power necessary to load the car in 1hour to its full capacity.
Gross battery capacity must be set in the vehicles settings.

targets.rawSql:
(SELECT
 '<0.8C' AS "Type",
 SUM("chargePower_kW") / (SELECT SUM("chargePower_kW") FROM charges) * 100 AS "Amount"
FROM charges
LEFT JOIN vehicles ON charges.vehicle_vin = vehicles.vin
LEFT JOIN vehicle_settings ON charges.vehicle_vin = vehicle_settings.vehicle_vin
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("carCapturedTimestamp") AND
  charges."chargePower_kW" <= (
    CASE WHEN vehicles."carType" = 'ELECTRIC' THEN vehicle_settings."primary_capacity_total"::NUMERIC
         ELSE vehicle_settings."secondary_capacity_total"::NUMERIC
    END
    * 0.8) AND
  charges."chargingState" = 'CHARGING' AND
  charges.vehicle_vin = '$VIN')
UNION
SELECT
 '>0.8C' AS label,
 SUM("chargePower_kW") / (SELECT SUM("chargePower_kW") FROM charges) * 100 AS "Amount"
FROM charges
LEFT JOIN vehicles ON charges.vehicle_vin = vehicles.vin
LEFT JOIN vehicle_settings ON charges.vehicle_vin = vehicle_settings.vehicle_vin
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("carCapturedTimestamp") AND
  charges."chargePower_kW" > (
    CASE WHEN vehicles."carType" = 'ELECTRIC' THEN vehicle_settings."primary_capacity_total"::NUMERIC
         ELSE vehicle_settings."secondary_capacity_total"::NUMERIC
    END
    * 0.8) AND
  charges."chargingState" = 'CHARGING' AND
  charges.vehicle_vin = '$VIN'

panels.title: Charging Load

panels.description: Distribution of the power used for charging (percentage by time).

targets.rawSql:
(SELECT
 width_bucket("chargePower_kW",-1,15,16) AS power,
 (((width_bucket("chargePower_kW",-1,15,16)-1.5)))::TEXT || 'kW to ' || (((width_bucket("chargePower_kW",-1,15,16)-0.5)))::TEXT || 'kW' AS metric,
 ((width_bucket("chargePower_kW",-1,15,16)::decimal-1)) AS middle,
 SUM("chargePower_kW") / (SELECT SUM("chargePower_kW") FROM charges) * 100 AS Amount
FROM charges
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("carCapturedTimestamp") AND
  "chargePower_kW" < 15 AND
  charges."chargingState" = 'CHARGING' AND
  charges.vehicle_vin = '$VIN'
GROUP BY power, metric, middle
ORDER BY 1)

UNION
(SELECT
 width_bucket("chargePower_kW",15,205,19) AS power,
 (((width_bucket("chargePower_kW",-5,205,21)-1.5)*(210/21)))::TEXT || 'kW to ' || (((width_bucket("chargePower_kW",-5,205,21)-0.5)*(210/21)))::TEXT || 'kW' AS metric,
 ((width_bucket("chargePower_kW",-5,205,21)::decimal-1)*(210/21)) AS middle,
 SUM("chargePower_kW") / (SELECT SUM("chargePower_kW") FROM charges) * 100 AS Amount
FROM charges
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("carCapturedTimestamp") AND
  "chargePower_kW" > 15 AND
  charges."chargingState" = 'CHARGING' AND
  charges.vehicle_vin = '$VIN'
GROUP BY power, metric, middle
ORDER BY 1)
ORDER BY middle

panels.title: Power distribution

panels.description:
Distribution of the charging time over the day.
For meaningful values wait until a significant number of charging sessions were recorded. Change timezone in vehicle settings.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
 EXTRACT(HOUR FROM (("carCapturedTimestamp"::timestamp AT TIME ZONE 'UTC') AT TIME ZONE COALESCE(vehicle_settings.timezone, 'UTC'))) AS "Hour",
 (COUNT(*) / CAST( SUM(COUNT(*)) over () as FLOAT) * 100) AS "Number",
 ROUND((COUNT(*) / CAST( SUM(COUNT(*)) over () as FLOAT) * 100))::TEXT || '% of charging time' AS "Text"
FROM charges
LEFT JOIN vehicle_settings ON charges.vehicle_vin = vehicle_settings.vehicle_vin
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("carCapturedTimestamp") AND
  charges."chargingState" = 'CHARGING' AND
  charges.vehicle_vin = '$VIN'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

panels.title: Hourly distribution in timezone $car_timezone

panels.description:
Charging speeds at different SoC.
For meaningful values wait until a significant number of charging sessions were recorded. Only DC charging sessions are considered.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  battery."currentSOC_pct" AS "soc",
  MAX(charges."chargePower_kW") AS "max",
  AVG(charges."chargePower_kW") AS "avg",
  MIN(charges."chargePower_kW") AS "min",
  'max. ' || MAX(charges."chargePower_kW")::TEXT || 'kW from ' || COUNT(charges."chargePower_kW")::TEXT  || ' values' AS "maxText",
  'avg. ' || ROUND(AVG(charges."chargePower_kW")::DECIMAL,2)::TEXT || 'kW from ' || COUNT(charges."chargePower_kW")::TEXT  || ' values' AS "avgText",
  'min. ' || MIN(charges."chargePower_kW")::TEXT || 'kW from ' || COUNT(charges."chargePower_kW")::TEXT  || ' values' AS "minText"
FROM
  charges
INNER JOIN charging_sessions ON charges."carCapturedTimestamp" > charging_sessions.started AND charges."carCapturedTimestamp" < charging_sessions.ended
INNER JOIN battery ON battery."carCapturedTimestamp" = (SELECT battery."carCapturedTimestamp" FROM battery WHERE battery."carCapturedTimestamp" > charges."carCapturedTimestamp" - interval '120 SECONDS' AND battery."carCapturedTimestamp" < charges."carCapturedTimestamp" + interval '120 SECONDS' ORDER BY ABS(EXTRACT(epoch FROM (battery."carCapturedTimestamp" - charges."carCapturedTimestamp"))) ASC LIMIT 1)
WHERE
    charging_sessions.acdc = 'DC' AND
    charges."chargePower_kW" > 0 AND
    $__timeFilter(charges."carCapturedTimestamp") AND
    charges.vehicle_vin = '$VIN'
GROUP BY soc
ORDER by soc ASC

panels.title: DC Charging Speed by SoC

panels.description:
Distribution of the time remaining in a specific SoC.
For meaningful values wait until a significant number ofvalues were recorded.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
 "SoC_pct",
 "Time"/ SUM("Time") OVER () * 100 AS "Time",
 ROUND(("Time"/ SUM("Time") OVER () * 100)::numeric, 2)::TEXT || '% of time' AS "Text"
FROM
(
SELECT
 "SoC_pct",
 SUM("Duration") AS "Time"
FROM
(SELECT
floor("currentSOC_pct" / 5) * 5 AS "SoC_pct",
EXTRACT(epoch FROM ("carCapturedTimestamp" - lag(battery."carCapturedTimestamp") over (order by "carCapturedTimestamp"))) AS "Duration"
FROM battery
LEFT JOIN vehicle_settings ON battery.vehicle_vin = vehicle_settings.vehicle_vin
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("carCapturedTimestamp") AND
  battery.vehicle_vin = '$VIN'
ORDER BY 1) AS data
GROUP BY "SoC_pct") AS data2

panels.title: Distribution of time remaining in SoC

list.definition: SELECT "vin" || ':' || "nickname" || ' (' || "model" || ' - ' || "carType" || ')' FROM vehicles LEFT JOIN vehicle_settings ON vehicles.VIN = vehicle_settings.vehicle_vin WHERE vehicle_settings.hide IS NOT True ORDER BY vehicle_settings.sorting_order ASC
list.description: Select Car if you have multiple cars in your account
list.label: Car
list.name: VIN
list.query: SELECT "vin" || ':' || "nickname" || ' (' || "model" || ' - ' || "carType" || ')' FROM vehicles LEFT JOIN vehicle_settings ON vehicles.VIN = vehicle_settings.vehicle_vin WHERE vehicle_settings.hide IS NOT True ORDER BY vehicle_settings.sorting_order ASC

list.definition: SELECT COALESCE(timezone, 'UTC') FROM vehicle_settings WHERE vehicle_vin='$VIN'
list.description: Timezone selected for the car (UTC if nothing was selected)
list.label: The Cars timezone
list.name: car_timezone
list.query: SELECT COALESCE(timezone, 'UTC') FROM vehicle_settings WHERE vehicle_vin='$VIN'

list.definition: SELECT tag.name || ': ' || tag.description || '$' || tag.name FROM charging_tag LEFT JOIN tag ON charging_tag.tag_name = tag.name WHERE use_charges = true
list.label: Show
list.name: tag
list.query: SELECT tag.name || ': ' || tag.description || '$' || tag.name FROM charging_tag LEFT JOIN tag ON charging_tag.tag_name = tag.name WHERE use_charges = true

list.definition: SELECT CASE WHEN LENGTH($$${tag:raw}$$)>0 AND $$${tag:singlequote}$$ != 'all_values' THEN $$ AND charging_tag.tag_name IN (${tag:singlequote}) $$ ELSE '' END
list.name: tag_sql
list.query: SELECT CASE WHEN LENGTH($$${tag:raw}$$)>0 AND $$${tag:singlequote}$$ != 'all_values' THEN $$ AND charging_tag.tag_name IN (${tag:singlequote}) $$ ELSE '' END
